gms_home.destination-title: Grand Residences is more than just relaxation and beautiful white sand beaches
gms_home.destination-description: During your stay at Grand Residences, you will have a wide variety of surprising places to explore, fun activities, and other close destinations to visit, making your vacation an even more entertaining experience.

destination-list.title: Puerto Morelos: Tranquil Escape
destination-list.description: Find serenity in Puerto Morelos with its laid-back charm. Snorkel around the reefÂ´s national park, unwind on pristine beaches, and savor the day's catch at local in - town or seaside restaurants .

destination-list.title: Cancun: Beach Bliss
destination-list.description: Indulge in beautiful turquoise waters, vibrant nightlife by the pristine beaches, and Mayan treasures. Discover ancient ruins like El Rey, dive into underwater wonders, and savor Cancun's culinary scene. Cancun welcomes you to unwind and thrive!

destination-list.title: Playa del Carmen: Bohemian Rhythms
destination-list.description: Embrace the boho-chic vibe of Playa del Carmen. Stroll along the Quinta Avenida to shop at eclectic markets, explore the different close-by eco-archaeological parks, and dance the night away under the stars at one of the various famous beach clubs. Playa del Carmen is where fun meets freedom!

destination-list.title: Riviera Maya: Nature's Enchantment
destination-list.description: Immerse in the Riviera Maya's natural wonders. Tulum's ancient ruins, lush jungles, eco-parks, and sacred hidden cenotes await you. Explore the mystique, relish local flavors, and experience the vibrant energy of the Quinta Avenida in Playa del Carmen.
